alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Union; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:32PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bradford, eastern Alachua, northwestern Putnam, central Union and western Clay Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 232 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lake Butler to near Cross Creek. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Starke, Lake Butler, Interlachen, Keystone Heights, Raiford, Melrose, Hawthorne, New River, Florahome and Melrose Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Union; Western Clay; Western Putnam
